```{r}

library(purrr)
library(tibble)
library(tictoc)
library(dplyr)
library(rsample)
```
```{r}
df <- palmerpenguins::penguins

dfl <-
  bootstraps(df, times = 20000)
```

```{r}
dfl_all <-
  map_df(dfl$splits, \(x) as_tibble(x))
```

```{r}
tictoc::tic()
dfl_all |> arrange(bill_length_mm)
tictoc::toc()
```
